articles.title: OPPO Reno6 Lite (Renamed OPPO F19) Coming To Europe Soon - Gizchina.com
articles.description: The OPPO Reno6 Lite is not anything new but the renamed OPPO F19. According to the latest leaks, it will hit the European market soon.
articles.content: We know that the OPPO Reno7 series models will hit the market in the near future. But this doesnt mean there will be no new model in the previous series. Recently, a Twitter tipster found out that th… [+2514 chars]
